response.message: In "largest community of developers in the world", what  does "community" mean? Doesn't Github have more users?
What do you mean by "anonymous votes"?
@nhinkle I presume vote feedback by users not logged in

Grammatical error: If you were to take the number of visitors to Stack Exchange sites in 2014, it would be larger the populations of the United States, Russia and Brazil combined.

Than is missing
Thank you for the correction.

"We did this without posting celebrity gossip, top 10 lists, or cat pictures."

Err... http://chat.meta.stackexchange.com/transcript/message/2879344#2879344 & http://chat.meta.stackexchange.com/search?q=.gif&Room=89&page=1&pagesize=50&sort=newest
Unfortunately, no native Windows phone app?

@radmuzom: So, they're going to get a sternly worded letter from all of the Windows Phone users.... sooooo... uhhhh.... judging by the people that have posted about it now, you and me.

But those will be 2 VERY sternly worded letters.  It may even take 2 or 3 tweets to get all of the complaint.
Wow, 205 employees. It is really quite a large company now.
Woohoo, PPCG managed to be in this blog post! Happy New Year, Stack Exchange, and looking forward to a wonderful 2015.

Re: Windows Phone app, see https://twitter.com/df07/status/464777365777027073 

"Percent of mobile traffic to SO on Windows Phone: 3%. Percent of blog comments on iOS launch asking for WP app: 38%."
@Fundamental: Perhaps the % mobile traffic is so low because there is no native app.
Congratulations! I hope you reach many more milestones.
Congratulations Stack

Stack Exchange - "6.4 billion page views last year alone"
almost equal with 7 billion people, the population in this Earth.
WoW

Still waiting to use a Windows Phone version of the app. 

Sure the mobile site has improved but still not fast as a notice app.
gandu hai sab.. bhutiya.... itne kaam number me marwa rahe hai

 - 1.8 million accepted answers

It is the best website to get all techinal information. It helps me alot in solving the wordpress and blogspot problems.
